action.text: Czeshch,^start(animations/Stand/Gestures/Hey_1) mam na eameaEoon Zeneck. BEoondEoon rozmaveaaw z tobon v spraveae pratsi, o cktooron shEoon oobeaegawesh. Zanjm zachznjemi, zroobmi demo, pżzez tsawi viveaad dostanjes 10 seckoond na odpoveaed na ckaside pitanje po oopwiveae chasoo bEoondEoon ckontinooovaw z nastEoonpnim pitanjem. ^wait(animations/Stand/Gestures/Hey_1)

startAction.text: yack d'ov'ee'ej'aw'esh shEoon o tey oferche pratsi ?
porozmaveaaymi o tobeae. yackeae son tvoye hobbi, tvoye ocheckeavanjeaa ea tsele?
dlachego yestesh zaeanteresovani ton oferton pratsi?
dlachego oovasiash sie to stanoveascko yest dla chebeae vwashchve ?
porozmaveaaymi o tvoeah osobeastih tsetsats. chi mosiesh podach  tsetsi harackteroo, cktoore naylepeaey chEoon opeasooyon ?
tso sonjs o svoeah oomeaeyEoontnoshchah pżivoodchih? yackeam leaderem bish biw?
chi mosiesh podach pgick wad demonstroo yont'si  tvoye oomeaeyEntnoshch pgiv vood dch'e ?
yeshlea dostanjes eannon ofertEoon pratsi, yack bish shEoon choow ?

action.text: rozmova ^start(animations/Stand/Gestures/Hey_1) dobeaegwa ckonjtsa, jEoonckooyemi za oojaw, poeanformooyemi chEoon o postEoonpah. ^wait(animations/Stand/Gestures/Hey_1)
